jobDescription: Great IT job opportunity for college students in Junior or Senior year of college pursuing a BS Degree in IT or Business Marketing!!! BS College Graduates also encouraged to apply! We have a temp opening to support the IT Department for a reputable Consumer Products company located in the Mercer County / Princeton Junction area. Below are the Job Description and Requirements: Requirements:Juniors or Seniors pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in an Information Technology or Business/Marketing fieldWill also consider someone that has a Bachelor's Degree, assuming they understand this is only a temporary role and not a temp to perm roleWorking knowledge of Microsoft Office (MS Excel strongly preferred)Able to manage multiple timelines and prioritiesStrong written and verbal communication skills requiredWillingness to work in a fast-paced environment, desire to learn and contribute to a growing companyCandidates must be legally authorized to work in the U.S.Job Description:As part of newly created dedicated analytics department, we are seeking candidates with passion for data and visualization utilizing latest technologies like SQL server, Power BI, SQL, etc. on MS-Azure cloud environment.Candidates will be involved in multiple global DW projects for data ingestion, computation and transformation to help organization drive valuable insights.Experience in data analytics is a great opportunity to learn the latest technologies with a focus on CPG industry.
